DOC.brief_summary: Hypotension spinal anesthesia cesarean delivery occur frequently . Oscillometric measurement give intermittent information . Nexfin , continuous noninvasive device , could help detect hypotension .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation NEXFIN During Cesarean Delivery Detect Hypotension
DOC.criteria: adult patient undergo elective cesarean delivery perform spinal anesthesia patient heart rhythm disorder , Raynaud 's disease history vascular surgery upper limb
